label: Cleaning Equipment
description: Tools and machines used for cleaning various surfaces and materials.
intents: Find the best cleaning equipment for my needs.
Learn how to clean specific surfaces or materials.

subcategories.label: Vacuum Cleaners
subcategories.description: Machines that use suction to remove dirt and dust from floors and surfaces.

subcategories.label: Floor Cleaning
subcategories.description: Tools and machines used for cleaning floors.

subcategories.label: Brushes and Scrubbers
subcategories.description: Tools used for scrubbing and cleaning various surfaces.

subcategories.label: Steam Cleaners
subcategories.description: Machines that use hot steam to clean and sanitize surfaces.

subcategories.label: Pressure Washers
subcategories.description: Machines that use high-pressure water to clean various surfaces.
